title: Gemini’s new beta feature provides proactive responses based on your photos, emails, and more
description: Personal Intelligence is off by default, as users have the option to choose if and when they want to connect their Google apps to Gemini.
content: Personal Intelligence is off by default, as users have the option to choose if and when they want to connect their Google apps to Gemini.
